labels.analysis: The MCP Server primarily functions as a specialized interface for accessing and navigating the Minecraft Wiki. It provides tools for searching, retrieving, and organizing detailed information about Minecraft-related content such as structures, entities, items, and blocks. The server is designed to facilitate efficient access to the official wiki's content, supporting multi-language access and offering structured workflows for retrieving specific information through a series of interconnected tools.
labels.reasoning: The primary label is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around searching and retrieving information from the Minecraft Wiki, which aligns with the Web Search & Research category. Secondary labels are added because the server also involves searching and accessing categorical information, which fits well with the Database Operations category. The Game Information label is a custom label to reflect the server's specialized focus on Minecraft-related content, which is unique to the context of the Minecraft Wiki.

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_searchWiki
tools.description: Search the Minecraft Wiki for a specific structure, entity, item or block. NOTE: Only use for basic search terms like item/block/structure/entity names - complex queries (like 'loot table of X' or 'how to craft Y') will not work. For best results: 1. Search for the basic entity/structure/etc name first, 2. Then use getPageSummary to see available sections, 3. Finally use getPageSection to get specific section content.

query.description: Search term to find on the Minecraft Wiki.

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_getPageSummary
tools.description: Step 2 of the recommended workflow: After finding a page through search, use this to get both the page summary AND a list of all available sections. This helps determine which specific section to retrieve next using getPageSection.

title.description: Title of the Minecraft Wiki page

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_getSectionsInPage
tools.description: Retrieves an overview of all sections in the page.

title.description: Title of the page to retrieve sections for.

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_getPageSection
tools.description: Get a specific section from a Minecraft Wiki page. Should be used as step 3 after searching for the page and getting its summary. The section index corresponds to the order of sections on the page, starting with 0 for the main content, 1 for the first section, 2 for the second section, etc.

title.description: Title of the Minecraft Wiki page

sectionIndex.description: Index of the section to retrieve (0 = main, 1 = first section, 2 = second section, etc.)

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_getPageContent
tools.description: Get the raw wikitext content of a specific Minecraft Wiki page.

title.description: Title of the Minecraft Wiki page to retrieve the raw wikitext content for.

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_resolveRedirect
tools.description: Resolve a redirect and return the title of the target page.

title.description: Title of the page to resolve the redirect for.

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_listCategoryMembers
tools.description: List all pages that are members of a specific category on the Minecraft Wiki.

category.description: The name of the category to list members from (e.g., 'Items', 'Blocks', 'Entities', 'Structure Blueprints').

limit.description: The maximum number of pages to return (default: 100, max: 500).

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_listAllCategories
tools.description: List all categories in the Minecraft Wiki.

limit.description: The maximum number of categories to return (default: 10, max: 500).

tools.name: MinecraftWiki_getCategoriesForPage
tools.description: Get categories associated with a specific page.

title.description: Title of the Minecraft Wiki page

server_info_crawled.name: Minecraft Wiki Server
server_info_crawled.author: @L3-N0X/Minecraft-Wiki-MCP
server_info_crawled.overview: Browse the official Minecraft Wiki effortlessly. Search for structures, entities, items, and blocks, and access detailed content with ease. Enjoy multi-language support to explore the wiki in your preferred language.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

config = {
  "apiUrl": "https://minecraft.wiki/api.php"
}
# Encode config in base64
config_b64 = base64.b64encode(json.dumps(config).encode()).decode()
smithery_api_key = ""

# Create server URL
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@L3-N0X/Minecraft-Wiki-MCP/mcp?config={config_b64}&api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
